about_the_game:
DUELANT – is a dueling simulator from a young indie team GamePunk Studio.

The near future. Duelant simulator will allow any player to immerse himself in the fascinating world of duels, while the risk of dying is reduced to zero. Now it is entertainment and the opportunity to earn money in virtual battles. However, adrenaline and excitement has not canceled. Each opponent is a new challenge. Each arena - unpredictable conditions. Each duel - new rules.

Each duelist will be accompanied by the AI-assistant Malena, who will always find the right words to motivate... or simply rejoice at the success of her protégé... or just be happy for her protégé's success..

Every battle in this game is a challenge and a test for the strong of heart. At the same time, the duels themselves are limited by time. Only 30 seconds to find out who is the toughest duelist here.


  • different weather conditions;
  • possibility to buy new types of weapons;
  • ever-changing dueling rules;
  • the AI companion Malena, who accompanies the players, with a distinctly Mrs.;
  • leaderboard of top shooters;
  • roguelike element in tournament mode, where each new fight carries the potential threat of rolling back all tournament progress to the beginning and forfeiting all money;
  • pumping character skills between duels;
  • ability to change character avatar on defeated Bosses;
  • shooting off unnecessary limbs from your opponents.

=============================================================

Face your opponents and yourself in exciting duels!
Become the undefeated champion of all time and setting!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of violence and images of blood.

name: DUELANT Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Blood, money and courage merge in different eras. It's time to determine the strongest fighter in this virtual world. Exciting battles await you in a variety of environments where your skill and chutzpah will play a decisive role.
